newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish rating agency to start debt paper bulletin.
newsitem.headline: Polish rating agency to start debt paper bulletin.

text.p: A Polish rating agency, the Central European Centre for Rating and Analysis SA, (CERA) said it would this week start to publish a bi-weekly bulletin which rates non-government debt instruments released in Poland.

It said in a statement on Tuesday the Rating & Rynek bulletin will be moulded for institutional investors and capital market players. The bulletin will be available in Polish and English versions after an initial test run in Polish only.
CERA is the first rating agency in Poland as well as the whole Eastern European region, the statement said.
